content:
A selection of three defining articles read aloud from the latest issue of The Economist

THIS WEEK, our cover story reports on the brewing conflict between America and Iran . Also, why the Mexican-American population is shrinking (10:05). And, what the latest trends in baby names say about how France is changing (17:34)

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机

Title: The threat of war between America and Iran, the shrinking Mexican-American population and hot French baby names
